main event: A UFO was observed in Florissant, Missouri on 20th May 1953 by Mr. Rollie Olsen, a civilian, who described the object as slowly descending from the west in the sky in a direct flight path from the porch of their residence. The observation lasted for 15-20 minutes with no further action required by the authorities.
interesting points: The UFO sighting involved 4 unidentified flying objects observed for 15-20 minutes in Florissant, Missouri.
The source of the report was a civilian, Mr. Rollie Olsen, a prosperous merchant of Florissant.
The object was observed descending from the west in the sky and appeared to move in a series of about eight surges or starts with one second intervals between.
It was noted that Mrs. Olsen, Mr. Olsen's wife, was unable to observe the object, but was disturbed by his manner and appearance during the observation.
The report concludes that no further action was required by the investigating authorities.
